steps.name: Main Housing.kit Main Housing.001
steps.description: Insert the main housing kit into the assembly.

steps.name: Bearing Inner Small 3.as Solid1:19.002
steps.description: Place the first small bearing ring into the left side of the housing kit.

steps.name: Inner Bearing  Large .as Solid1:18.002
steps.description: Place a bearing ring into the right side of the housing kit.

steps.name: Bearing 3.as Solid1:4.002
steps.description: Place a bigger bearing ring around the first ring on the left side of the housing kit.

steps.name: Bearing Large.as Solid1:5.002
steps.description: Place a bigger bearing ring around the first ring on the right side of the housing kit.

steps.name: Rotor  Female .as Solid1:6.002
steps.description: Place the smaller rotor into the left side of the housing kit.

steps.name: Rotor  Male .as Solid1:1.002
steps.description:
Place the bigger rotor into the right side of the housing kit.


Rotate it gently while placing it to make it fit properly.

steps.name: Sealing  Bearing .as Solid1:2.002
steps.description:
Place the sealing bearing into the housing kit from the bottom of the big rotor.

After placing it, the bearing should stay in place.

steps.name: Cap.as Solid1:22.002
steps.description: Place the cap to cover the bottom of the big rotor.

steps.name: Top Lid.as Top Lid.001
steps.description: Place the lid on top of the two rotors.

steps.name: Bearing Inner Small 2.as Solid1:21.002
steps.description: Place a smaller bearing on the small rotor.

steps.name: Bearing Inner Small 1.as Solid1:20.002
steps.description: Place a smaller bearing on the big rotor.

steps.name: Bearing 2.as Solid1:10.002
steps.description: Place a big bearing above the smaller bearing of the small rotor.

steps.name: Bearing 1.as Solid1:9.002
steps.description: Place a big bearing above the smaller bearing of the big rotor.

steps.name: Bolt Short 2.as Bolt Short 2.001
steps.description: Place the bolt inside the left side of the lid.

steps.name: Bolt Short 1.as Bolt Short 1.001
steps.description: Place the bolt inside the right side of the lid.

steps.name: Ball Bearing 1.as Solid1:11.002
steps.description: Place the ball bearing on the rotor on the right side.

steps.name: Ball Bearing 2.as Solid1:3.002
steps.description: Place the ball bearing on the rotor on the left side.

steps.name: Fine Screw  M.as Solid1:17.002
steps.description: Screw on the first screw on the left rotor.

steps.name: Fine Screw  F.as Solid1:16.002
steps.description: Screw on the second screw on the right rotor.

steps.name: Bearing  Sealing .as Bearing  Sealing .001
steps.description: Place the sealing lid on top of the compressor.

steps.name: Large Bolt 4.as Solid1:15.002
steps.description: Place the first bolt through the sealing lid.

steps.name: Large Bolt 3.as Solid1:13.002
steps.description: Place the second bolt through the sealing lid.

steps.name: Large Bolt 2.as Solid1:14.002
steps.description: Place the third bolt through the sealing lid.

steps.name: Large Bolt 1.as Solid1:12.002
steps.description: Place the fourth bolt through the sealing lid.
